definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: This field is blank padded and is not null terminated.
sentences.chinese: 该字段用空格填充，且不以空字符结尾。

sentences.english: Unable to send test Message. Please verify the E-mail Address field.
sentences.chinese: 无法发送测试消息，请检查“电子邮件地址”字段。

sentences.english: In the example, add the genre of a movie as its own field.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，添加了电影风格作为内容类型的字段。

sentences.english: You could define fields to be accessed relationally on a per-form or per-database basis.
sentences.chinese: 可以按照表或者数据库定义以关系方式访问的字段。

sentences.english: These filters can be used on any field in your model.
sentences.chinese: 可以对模型中的任何字段使用这些筛选器。

sentences.english: Change the name of, or any contents of, any fields in the LOINC table.
sentences.chinese: 数据库表中任何字段的名称或内容。

sentences.english: The field cache has therefore been modified such that it only reloads parts where the segment has changed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，修改后的字段缓存只会加载更新过的片断。

sentences.english: The name of the field is listed in the first column.
sentences.chinese: 第一列中列出了字段名。

sentences.english: The event object data field will be the field constructor of the intermediate object.
sentences.chinese: 事件对象数据字段将成为中间对象的字段构造器。

sentences.english: The first seven fields above are used in connecting to the directory server.
sentences.chinese: 上面列出了连接到目录服务器时所使用的前七个字段。

sentences.english: In the context of this tutorial, you are mapping all fields.
sentences.chinese: 在本教程的环境中，您要映射所有字段。

sentences.english: Just iterate over the array of property names looking for the audit fields.
sentences.chinese: 只需循环遍历属性名数组，寻找审计字段。

sentences.english: You can create fields to store nonspatial data for each shape.
sentences.chinese: 您可以创建字段来存储每个形状的非空间数据。

sentences.english: It had the additional advantage of supporting multivalued fields.
sentences.chinese: 它还有支持多值字段的优势。

sentences.english: Further fields and indices can be added, as required.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据需要进一步添加字段和索引。

sentences.english: Therefore, these components are not affected by the addition of this field.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这些组件不受添加这个字段的影响。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
